name: Trek (Honey Basil)
description:
Leap from cliff to cliff, jump off walls, swing from ropes, gliding from a cats tail, as you head through a strange cave, in search of a bizarre treasure! Trek has you taking control of a weird magic cat and his boy, a small descent into a weird world.

Thanks for playing this little project, mostly used as I learn to create sprites, design levels, and the ins and outs of game design!

Enjoy!
